WorkItem.Description:
I've tried to use VSTO to host WPF data grid in a Word task pane, however, I couldn't get the data to show up in the WPF control in the task pane.

The data would preview OK, but it wouldn't show up when I ran the project.

I created WPF libraries, and put one in the user control, host element in the startup project. 

Can't get it to work.
WorkItem.Summary: WPF Data grid in a Word Task Pane
